term.title: one-bond-flip

item.text: Photoisomerization of one double bond in a conjugated double bond system. It is a regular E/Zphotoisomerization. [image: Not defined] Compare with bicycle-pedal mechanism, hula-twist mechanism.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 293. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry, 3rd edition (IUPAC Recommendations 2006)' on page 377 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779030293)
